meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sam Deutsch Niki Peters Sarah Dubnik Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7235.

td.p: Sam Deutsch, a junior at the University of Southern California from Bethesda, Maryland (subtotal of $22,000)
Niki Peters, a sophomore at the University of California, Berkeley originally from Boise, Idaho (subtotal of $18,600)
Sarah Dubnik, a senior at the University of Pittsburgh from Jamison, Pennsylvania (subtotal of $22,001)

tr.td: YOU BUG ME
SPORTS RULES FILL IN THE BLANK
AROUND THE WHIRLED
(Alex: Notice the spelling of "whirled" there. We're dealing with anagrams here.)
DORM FOOD
SCI-FI BOOKS
COLORFUL WORDS & PHRASES

foul

SarahSam

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: And, Sam Deutsch, congratulations to you and USC. You\'re the new Jeopardy! champion.)
[Loud cheers and applause]
(Alex: You will, of course, be receiving a check for $100,000 and the Jeopardy! College Championship trophy.)
SarahWho is To Obama?
$4,800
SamWho is Biden Byrd
$8,600
NikiWho is Byrd?
$3,350
Joe Biden')

tr.td: THE U.S. SENATE

Sarah
Niki
Sam
Sarah
Niki
Sam

1st runner-up: $50,000
Tournament champion: $100,000 + a trophy

Niki
Sam

(including 1 DD),

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
